extendedInfo.description: The eight largest metropolis in India, Pune is a wonderful city! One of the largest cities in India, Pune has developed over the years to become an IT hub and economic centerPune Android app is your guide to the modernized city which is also a rich culturally. It is a perfect cosmopolitan city to go on an entertaining vacation for. This app familiarizes you with the city by providing info such as Weather, City Map, Must Visit, Nightlife, Hotels, Emergency and Lingo Help. Otherwise an offline app, only some categories require internet connectivity to work successfully. Weather: Get latest weather updates before you step out to explore the city. Internet connectivity is required to get the current weather updates. City Map: The City Map is your pathfinder that helps you navigate through the city and reach your desired destination easily from wherever you are. Must Visit: Pune, India's metropolis is known to be Maharashtra's cultural capital. The city has modernised with time, but its new-age architecture, focus on arts and crafts, music, education, and theatre as well as variety in cuisine, makes it a must-see city. Places like Aga khan palace, Chaturshringi Temple, Osho international meditation resort, Katraj snake park and zoo, Shanivarwada fort, Sinhgad fort, Raja kelkar museum, Saras baug, Lal mahal, and more are the city's famous attractions that offer a splendid experience. Nightlife: Pune has abundant pubs, clubs, lounges and discotheques. Hard Rock CafÃ©, Stone Water Grill, Baan Tao - Hotel Ista, High Spirits, The Hidden Place, Paasha, Cafe 1730 Beans & Booze, Trikaya, and many more are places to be in the evening. Hotels: Stay at the most luxurious hotels like Radisson Hotel Pune Kharadi, Vivanta by Taj - Blue Diamond, Sun N sand, Le Meridien, The Corinthians Boutique Hotel and many more. The app provides detailed info about hotels' ratings, location details, cuisine served, contact info, etc.Emergency: Get emergency help anywhere anytime in a few clicks about Airlines, Medical, Crime, Railways, Tourist Enquiry, etc from within the application. Lingo Help: Internet is required to use this feature. The default translation is to English language, which eases communication at large with localites. Pune, packed with necessary details is your personal virtual guide to the enormous city of Pune. Make your stay in the city exciting & fun! Download now! Note: All information is indicative to help the user best navigate through the Pune and is taken from various web sites. No content of the application is copyrighted by Silver Touch- Though the Design and presentation of the application is copyrighted by Silver Touch Technologies Ltd,. India.
